name: DrSlim
0:
”Alexa, open, doctor slim”
”Alexa, start, doctor slim”
”Alexa, launch, doctor slim”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: doctor slim
des:
The project aims at developing a "Smart Professor" to manage full classroom interactions.. 

Initially, an Organizational Behavior case is simulated with student interaction capabilities..

You will be asked throughout the simulation to take decisions on the basis of the information provided... 

If you are interested in joining the effort, please contact slim.saidi@rit.edu
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
